item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Feb 2018. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Feb 2018 (when applicable). New: The Performance Review Commission (PRC) quarterly online review has been launched. Just published: The draft Performance Review Report 2017 is now available for stakeholder comments and feedback. The deadline for receipt of comments is 16:00 on Friday 06 April 2018.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Jan 2018. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Jan 2018 (when applicable).

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Dec 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Dec 2017 (when applicable). NEW: The interactive ACE online dashboard is now available online. The new interactive online dashboard enables interested stakeholders to access the latest available ACE data and analysis. Using the interactive functionalities of the dashboard, stakeholders can design and customise specific analyses and presentations covering the 2002-2015 period.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Sep 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Sep 2017 (when applicable). Update: The Performance Review Commission (PRC) quarterly online review - Q3-2017 is now available.

item.description: Data updates up to August 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: The data download files have been updated up to August 2017 (when applicable).

item.description: Data updates up to July 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: The data download files have been updated up to July 2017 (when applicable).

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to June 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: The data download files have been updated up to June 2017 (when applicable). Update: The Performance Review Commission (PRC) quarterly online review - Jan-Jun 2017 is now available. Just printed: Printed copies of the PRR 2016 are now available. Copies can be obtained by completing the online order form. Just published: The study on the Acceptable Level of Safety Performance (ALoSP) implementation in EUROCONTROL Member States has just been published.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to May 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: The data download files have been updated up to May 2017 (when applicable). Update: As of this release, the download files with the old ATFM delay calculation as of 04 April (version 1) were discontinued. New: The complexity data as of January 2017 are now based on the new BADA version (3.13.1, previously it was 3.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Apr 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Apr 2017 (when applicable). Update: The Performance Review Commission (PRC) quarterly online review - Q1-2017 is now available.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Mar 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Mar 2017 (when applicable).

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Feb 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Feb 2017 (when applicable). New: The Performance Review Commission (PRC) quarterly online review has been launched. Just published: The draft final Performance Review Report 2016 is now available for stakeholder comments and feedback. The deadline for receipt of comments is 16:00 on Friday 07 April 2017.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Jan 2017. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Jan 2017 (when applicable.) Just published: Two technical reports on Vertical Flight Efficiency one on en-route vertical flight efficiency {% cite en-route-vertical-flight-efficiency_consultation –file aviation %} and the other on vertical flight efficienty during climb and descent {% cite vertical-flight-efficiency-during-climb-and-descent_consultation –file aviation %}. Just published: Review of civil military coordination and cooperation arrangements in Member States {% cite prc-civil-mil-coop –file aviation %}.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Dec 2016. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Dec 2016 (when applicable)

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Nov 2016. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Nov 2016 (when applicable) Just published: U.S. â€“ Europe comparison of ANS cost-efficiency trends (2006-2014). The report is a factual high-level comparison of Air Navigation Services (ANS) provision costs in Europe and the United States of America (US), based on comparable data and the well-established ACE economic performance framework.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Oct 2016. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Oct 2016 (when applicable) New: ATFM delay data for different versions following software release 20.0 of the Network Manager available in the download area New: Erfurt (EDDE) airport included in ASMA data New: Erfurt (EDDE) airport and Saarbrucken (EDDR) airport included in Taxi out data Update: ATFM delay due to LFDSNA related ATFM regulations added

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Sep 2016. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Sep 2016 (when applicable) Update: “En-Route IFR Flights and ATFM delays (FIR)” - data processing issue for traffic on 9th May and 23rd Aug 2016 has been corrected in this release.

item.title: Release Notes
Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Jul 2016, flow studies updated to 2001-2015 period. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Jul 2016 (when applicable) Update: Intra and Extra flows studies have been updated to cover the 2001 - 2015 period (previously 2007 - 2014)

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Jun 2016 The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Jun 2016 (when applicable) New: Additional columns in En-route ATFM delay data in the Data section Number of en-route ATFM delayed flights Number of en-route ATFM delayed flights (>15 min.)

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Jun 2016 The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to Jun 2016 (when applicable)

item.title: Release Notes
Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Apr 2016, new methodology entries, additional charts The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to April 2016 (when applicable) New: State level information (based on FIR) for en-route ATFM delay and traffic in the Data section

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Mar 2016, new methodology entries, additional charts The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to March 2016 (when applicable). New: updated Methodology section with additional entries: Additional ASMA Time Performance Indicator. Taxi-out Time Performance Indicator. New: Vertical Flight Efficiency during Climb and Descend study. New: added horizontal bar chart for ‘Flights by entity Year-to-Year’. choropleth map for ‘En-route ATFM delays by FAB (FIR)’.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Feb 2016, new web address (for real), two new methodology topics. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to February 2016 (when applicable). New: The URL for the PRU Website is now ansperformance.eu. New: Horizontal en-route flight efficiency key performance indicators (KEP/KEA) included in data. New: added two topics in Methodology section. Update: additions and enhancements in Definitions.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Jan 2016, new web address, new methodology section. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to January 2016 (when applicable). New: The URL for the PRU Website is now ansperformance.eu New: Started filling the long-awaited Methodology section. Update: Little changes/enhancements in Definitions.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates up to Dec 2015, added new definitions. The following changes have been delivered in this release: Update: Data download files updated up to December 2015 (when applicable). New: added new definitions in the References section.

item.title: Release Notes
Release Notes
Release Notes
item.description: Data updates for Sep 2015, data visualisations, HFE filtered CSV download. The following changes have been published in this release: Update: Data download files updated with September 2015 data (when applicable). New: Graphs section with data visualisations. New: Horizontal Flight Efficiency filtered CSV download page. New: Search capability via DuckDuckGo search engine. Update: little aesthetic enhancements.

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Data updates for Aug 2015, flown distances for HFE. The following changes have been published in this release: Update: Data download files updated with August 2015 data (when applicable). New: provision of direct flown distances in the horizontal en-route flight efficiency data. Update: Re-structure of the main sections of the site and little aesthetic enhancements.
